output_list.impact: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The buy function has no period constraint, allowing the owner to buy tokens without a price check.
The sell function has no period constraint, allowing the owner to sell tokens without a price check.
The burn function has no period constraint, allowing the owner to burn tokens without a price check.
Integer overflow in freezeAccount function allows the owner to freeze an arbitrary user's account.
Integer overflow in setPrices function allows the owner to set arbitrary price values.
